The Sharud is an ideal top for staying cool in hot weather. Advanced production techniques allow Habidash to make a light yet absorbent shawl that looks and feels like handspun natural cotton but at a fraction of the cost. The three arm band pieces provide stylish accents and come embedded with microchips that tracks body temperature and other vitals.
